t: Lag fixer - App on Amazon Appstore
s: Over time, your programs write to the app cache on your phone and eat up precious system resources while slowing everything down! on some devices, you have to go on settings>apps>running>show cached processes but this trouble shooting will take too Long! Lag fixer will do it for you!

t: Amazon found every 100ms of latency cost them 1% in sales.
s: July 25, 2024 - 10 years ago, Amazon found that every 100ms of latency cost them 1% in sales. Google found an extra .5 seconds in search page generation time dropped traffic by 20%. A broker could lose $4 million in revenues per millisecond if their electronic trading platform is 5 milliseconds behind the ...

t: Amazon study: Every 100ms in Added Page Load Time Cost 1% in Revenue
s: April 21, 2024 - Amazon did a study that found every 100MS in latency cost 1% of sales. The lesson being: page speed matters — and a slow site that makes customers wait hurts your bottom line.

t: Monitor consumer lags - Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
s: Monitoring consumer lag allows you to identify slow or stuck consumers that aren't keeping up with the latest data available in a topic. t: How to Fix Amazon Prime Video Buffering/Stuttering/Freezing
